exerciseStatusTag.recommended:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating an exercise is recommended
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, status tag
**When Users See This**: When an exercise is marked as recommended
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Recommended"
exerciseStatusTag.available:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating an exercise is available
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, status tag
**When Users See This**: When an exercise is unlocked and available
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Available"
exerciseStatusTag.locked:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating an exercise is locked
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, status tag
**When Users See This**: When an exercise is locked and not accessible
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Locked"
difficulty.easy:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for easy difficulty level
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, difficulty tag
**When Users See This**: When viewing an exercise with 'easy' difficulty
**Technical Context**: Standard text; displayed next to an icon
**Current English**: "Easy"
difficulty.medium:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for medium difficulty level
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, difficulty tag
**When Users See This**: When viewing an exercise with 'medium' difficulty
**Technical Context**: Standard text; displayed next to an icon
**Current English**: "Medium"
difficulty.hard:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for hard difficulty level
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, difficulty tag
**When Users See This**: When viewing an exercise with 'hard' difficulty
**Technical Context**: Standard text; displayed next to an icon
**Current English**: "Hard"
exerciseTypeTag.learningExercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a learning exercise type
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, type tag
**When Users See This**: When viewing a 'concept' type exercise
**Technical Context**: Standard text; displayed next to a 'concept-exercise' icon
**Current English**: "Learning Exercise"
exerciseTypeTag.tutorialExercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a tutorial exercise type
**UI Location**: Exercise widget, type tag
**When Users See This**: When viewing a 'tutorial' type exercise
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Tutorial Exercise"
platformButton.devToButton.devTo:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the DEV.to share button
**UI Location**: Share panel, social media buttons
**When Users See This**: When the share panel is opened, allowing users to share content to DEV.to
**Technical Context**: Standard text; displayed next to a DEV.to icon
**Current English**: "DEV.to"
